meanings.definition: A person who eats or consumes immoderate amounts of food and drink.
meanings.sent1: The glutton at the party finished all the snacks in one go.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a glutton for pizza and can eat a whole pie by himself.
meanings.sent3: The glutton in the movie ate so much that he couldn't fit through the door!
meanings.sent4: Her appetite was like that of a glutton, devouring everything in sight.
meanings.sent5: The image of the glutton with a mountain of food in front of him was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To indulge in something excessively, especially food or drink.
meanings.sent1: I tend to glutton on ice cream when I'm feeling down.
meanings.sent2: She would glutton on chocolates whenever she had a bad day.
meanings.sent3: He would glutton on chips while watching his favorite TV show.
meanings.sent4: The kids would glutton on candy during Halloween night.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked cookies made her want to glutton on them immediately.
